name: GroundReferenceDemo

license.title: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License
license.plaintext: GroundReferenceDemo by Radiant Earth Foundation is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

methods: This dataset was collected by PlantVillage at Penn State University using Open Data Kit working with partner farms. When available, farmers filled out surveys about their crops.

attributes_def.id: Field_ID, a 3 part number #1.#2.#3. #1 refers to the lead farmer we are working with. This is all kept in a google drive document. For example, Josephine is Lead Farmer 1. Her number would look like 1.#.#. #2 refers to the number field you are at. For example, if we are surveying the 4th field of the day with Josephine; the ID would be 1.04. If there is no third number that means all the information is known about this field. #3 refers to if the field is an adjacent field. An adjacent field is constituted by being a field in the area we are working but little to none of the information is known. Typically fields with a 3rd number just have a polygon and a crop.
attributes_def.crop_name: Crop Type found in the field.
attributes_def.survey_date: Captures date and time of survey when it is completed.
attributes_def.water_resources: Water resources, if the field was rainfed or irrigated.
attributes_def.planting_date: Planting date, when the field was planted.
attributes_def.harvest_date: Harvest date, The month the field is expected to be harvested.
attributes_def.crop_density: Crop Density, Estimated in percentage cover calibration, based on image.
